body:
Drinking alcohol isn't an explicit constitutional right.  Better would be these prior restraints on writing an editorial, joining a congregation, or registering to vote.

All of which will come if these people have their way.

You know it's only a matter of time before signed consent forms, witnesses and body cams are required to prove consent.  Each new lick or nibble, to say nothing of each new thrust or stroke, will need to be accompanied by an updated form.  Sex will cease to be fun.
I recall years back a woman whose unfixed pet beagle got impregnated. She told me about her dog's situation: "She was raped."

So filled with logic, rational thought and fairness!  It will thus, of course, meet with much anger and vilification.  

Once again, Young hits the bulls-eye!

Aside: Agreed about some of those and don't know one way or the other about some others, but I gather that there is evidence that surgery for carpal tunnel syndrome can be effective when more conservative treatments had failed.  Certainly it gave my mother a number of her hobbies back that she'd had to give up because of carpal tunnel, which is obviously an anecdote and not data, but there appears to be data supporting its effectiveness in more serious cases as well.
